description:
This time, the Tesaguri club members pick on school volleyball teams, with Aoi`s prejudiced preconceptions again leading to a warped image of that club. Later in the gym, the members actually play volleyball, but can they do it while defending a town made out of blocks as well?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Watashi wa Anata Dake o Mitsumeru
私はあなただけを見つめる
